review_text: Wonderful place , very convenient to relatives house.very quiet place,and wonderful host.
great value
This place was awesome. This will be our go to spot in Marion from now on

Lasana is an amazing host! She was very attentive with my stay. The home felt like home. She showed a lot of attention to detail for her guest to help them navigate through the home by providing small post-it notes on the wall. I would be happy to stay with her again.
Wonderful place to stay .very close to my sons house
We enjoyed our stay. The home was clean and in a great location for us to visit friends nearby. The neighborhood was peaceful. Host was friendly and responsive.
This is a 5 star ✨ for me. Sharon is a great host.

Listing was as described and matched the photos. Host was responsive with any questions I had. The garage is a nice feature so you don’t have to leave your vehicle outside in an unknown area, although the neighborhood seemed very safe and friendly. The backyard is a nice space to hang out and relax with family/friends and is private with the fenced in yard. Would definitely recommend this property to anyone and if I’m in the area again would definitely stay here again.

This was one of the best Airbnbs we've ever stayed at! The home was clean and updated, the beds were comfortable, and it was a short drive to everything we needed. The host was responsive and SO kind! We would 100% stay here again.
Had a really nice stay for a couple weeks while on business. The neighborhood was extremely quiet. Very convenient to any of your needs around town. Wouldn’t hesitate to stay again!
Great house! Sat in the backyard and heard 15 different type of birds. Comfy furniture. Children games a big + when 7 yr old granddaughter came for visit. We will definitely be back.
A wonderful opportunity to experience FLW’s design. Grateful to Matthew for opening up his home to us. A very memorable experience for my family and I.

What a cool and unique place, with an awesome host to boot! Getting to stay in an authentic Frank Lloyd Wright home is a rare opportunity. The home itself still has most of what look like the original fixtures, and is true to the architect's vision. Matthew was always super welcoming and responsive. An added bonus for kids: there is a really great park right around the corner with an awesome playground. We hope to be back soon!

We found this Gem available for our last minute travel plans, that also allowed our four legged family members.
We are Frank Lloyd Wright fans and this masterpiece was everything we could have imagined and more.
We were blown away by the house and the amazing park down the street. Just perfect for a little getaway and immersed in a gorgeous piece of history.

I enjoyed spending a weekend at Woodside with my family and friends. The adults, including two architects, got to learn about the house while the kids explored the grounds. We were to go out to eat, but the kitchen was so well equipped we cooked instead.

Such a treat to experience this home! Each view is something to pause and take in.
Know that the house has quirks and you have to be flexible to look past them. Best to travel with close friends / family.

We had an amazing stay at Woodside!!! If you're passionate about interior design or architecture, staying in a Frank Lloyd Wright house is an unparalleled experience. It wasn't just a place to stay; it was a chance to live within a work of art. This particular Airbnb was exceptional, offering a well-preserved example of Wright's genius. For any design enthusiast, it's an opportunity not to be missed.
We had a great extended family get- together. We enjoyed the history and architecture of the home. It was incredible!

A real treat to stay in a Frank Lloyd Wright house. Unique architecture. Updated kitchen with high-end appliances. Nice grounds. Has some of the FLW quicks - easy to live with given the rare treat of staying in a great place. Hosts were very responsive and all was great.
A beautiful house and quiet area. Perfect for a weekend getaway or a small dinner party. The whole stay was a great experience and we will definitely be going back to Woodside.
This house is an absolute gem! We can’t wait to come back!
all the delight of an architectural gen, plus the comfort of a well stocked kitchen, lots of linens, lots of bathrooms and hot water. such a peaceful stay!

The Frank Lloyd Wright home was so well maintained , we loved our night staying here ! Our bed and linens were very comfortable!
Matthew was very prompt and kind in communicating with us, it was a perfect weekend getaway ! The house is exactly like the photos ! Thank you Matthew!

it was a privilege having the opportunity to stay in this amazing space. it made the special occasion we were celebrating all the more memorable. believe all the positive comments you read in these reviews, take the negative comments with a grain of salt. can't overstate how gracious it is of Matthew to share this historic treasure with the rest of us. thanks again Matthew, hope to visit again sometime!
I cannot express how beautiful and seamless this experience was. An incredible slice or architectural history and such an enjoyable stay.
The pictures really don’t do the Frank Lloyd Wright House justice! It is beautiful and Matthew made our family Christmas special.

We had the most magical stay at Woodside. Words can’t describe the warmth and comfort that emanate from each room. But if you know anything about this house I’m guessing you know that already! So here are the other details of our stay- the place was spotless, the kitchen had everything you could ever need, and the beds were super comfortable. The owner, Matthew, is hands down the most responsive and helpful Airbnb host I’ve ever encountered. It’s clear that he’s doing everything possible to maintain it exactly FLlW would see fit. Don’t pass up the opportunity to immerse yourself in this work of art!

What a unique experience to stay and feel what it’s like to live in a Frank Lloyd Wright House. The house is unexpected and peaceful. The heated flooring so cozy. We really enjoyed our stay at Woodside.
The bed arrangement is slightly different than in the pictures. On one wing there is a large master room with a king bed, and adjacent bathroom. A single twin bed in a room with seperate bathroom, as well. On the other wing is a bedroom with a single bed & a bedroom with a full sized bed. Both those have an en-suite with shared shower. Next to that those two rooms is a sitting room with fireplace and balcony. There is also a powder room off the main hallway. The main living room is amazing with the high ceilings large fireplace, big windows and tipi inspired architectural details. A true treasure and treat to stay in!
Amazing house, comfortable beds, very well-equipped kitchen. We had a great time.
Thank you. We have had a great time there with golden Fall times
Really cool!

It’s hard to put into words staying at Woodside. You feel like you’re transported back in time to a beautiful piece of history. I’m so grateful for the short time I was able to stay and can’t wait to go back!

The place is beautiful. We really enjoyed our time here and felt really at home. It’s a 70 year old historic home so it comes with some wear and tear, but it’s part of the experience. This was our honeymoon and we look forward to coming back to visit soon. Matthew was extremely responsive and he helped us find the booklets on the history of the home. If you are a Frank Lloyd Wright fan, I highly recommend taking a look through it.

Loved getting to enjoy first hand the architecture and seeing how the lighting changed the vibes. Seating and beds were comfortable. The kitchen was phenomenal. Loved cooking meals there. The house sound system was nice.
A few things we didn’t enjoy so much- the back door was open on arrival. Everything was fine except it was hot. It took time to cool down and the main air unit became noisy and annoying.
The house is dated and needs some repairs. The electrical system appears to be original to the house. Many of the switches did not work or were touchy. There were areas where tiles were missing on the floors and in the bathrooms. There were no shower curtains and the jacuzzi tub was not functional.
The main bedroom was musty and hot. A window unit cooled it down but the result was cool musty air.

The outdoor deck should be replaced. It bounced when walked on and the steps were falling apart.
While we enjoyed the experience overall I don’t feel it was worth the $$$.

It was a thrill to stay in a Frank Lloyd Wright home. We very much enjoyed our stay. We’ll equipped kitchen. Wonderful outdoor terrace. Clean, neat house. Spacious. Huge living room. Beautiful artwork. Kid’s wing. Wonderful grounds. As those of you that understand the complexities and oddities of a old Frank Lloyd Wright house, this one, too, is a work in progress and upkeep. The owner is obviously working to maintain the property. But don’t expect everything to be in pristine condition. The owner is great to work with; very responsive and understanding. I hope to stay there again!

The Davis House is a rare ascending space in Wright's oeuvre, a Usonian house that seems to combine the characteristics of the Guggenheim Museum. Rare blue print drawings can also be seen. The owner is very helpful and friendly. It was a very impressive stay. Thank you very much.
What a wonderfully preserved Frank Lloyd Wright home and in great condition. A must-do for any Frank Lloyd Wright fan. Plus it's in a very quiet area, perfect for a weekend getaway. Loved it!
Beautiful and unique home, Matthew is a great host!
Amazing!

I grew up in this town and always wondered what the house looked like on the inside. Then I married a BSU architecture grad and big fan of FLW. So fast-forward many years when we had to travel back to Marion for a family wedding - it seemed like the best place for our family to stay while in town. It was also for a special treat for my husband.
It was everything we expected and had such a cool factor. It’s unique and quirky and exactly what an original FLW house should be. It was an amazing experience to stay in this home.
Matthew was responsive and a great host. The house is fully stocked and the kitchen has everything you need…and then some!
What a gem.
We feel privileged to have been allowed to stay at this landmark. We enjoyed exploring the fascinating story behind it. It is very beautiful. The owner was responsive and helpful.
Had a great time and am looking forward to staying again.

We had a great stay and it was exactly what we expected. Matthew was a great host and if we had any questions he was always available to talk to. The kitchen was wonderful. We enjoyed learning about the history of the house. We hope to be making reservations to stay there again soon.

Five Stars all around for this house and the host! Staying in a Frank Lloyd Wright house is a fantastic experience! Each different time of the day/night showed light and shadows that were so intentional and picturesque. Our daughter is a huge architecture fan; this was a fun way to create lifelong memories with her! Matthew was an incredibly generous host with his time and he shared stories about the house and previous owners. He had a fire ready for us to start in the fireplace, which was magical! We were planning to go out to eat, but the grocery store was only a mile away, so we made steaks and had all the trimmings. Super easy! Thank you for everything, Matthew! We highly recommend this getaway and look forward to returning!

A very rare opportunity to stay in a Frank Lloyd Wright architected home - we loved it! We came for a weekend to stay for my friend's 60th birthday. She is a huge FLW fan, and we surprised her with this trip. We were blown away by the architectural integrity, the documentation that was provided telling about the home and the history, and the high end appliances in the kitchen. Matthew answered all of our questions promptly, and was a joy to work with on this stay. The home has tons of room, and was more than what we four needed. We loved being able to stay in this home which is on the registry of historic places as well! The caretaker had a fire built and ready for us to light in the iron stove, and we took advantage of that. If you are looking for a peaceful escape and a place to cozy in for a few days, you couldn't go wrong here.
Great stay in a unique home. Nearby Matter Park has a great disc golf course. The full kitchen was great.

I was looking for a unique and memorable place to take the family to celebrate New Years Eve. This place exceeded all of my expectations and left us with such wonderful memories. How often do you get to spend a night in a museum? The Host was super responsive and you can tell loved to be able to share his piece of history. A great experience I highly recommend.

We had a great stay in this FLW house. Enjoyed the wonderful kitchen and the expansive great room with fireplace (wood stove). Matt was a very responsive host and made check-in super easy. This was a wonderful post-Christmas relaxing retreat for our family.

In the theme of Thanksgiving: We were grateful for the following:
1) Matthew sharing his incredible Frank Lloyd Wright home with us.
2) The well stocked kitchen to prepare our lovely Thanksgiving meal.
3) The opportunity to be with each other in front of a roaring fire.
4) The extremely relaxing weekend because the home is located in a very quiet neighborhood.
5) The mild weather, so that we were able to take advantage of the backyard and look at the brilliant night sky.
Our experience was magical. We will be back!!!!😊😊😊
Very nice experience for FLW admirers.
Timeless architecture. Good location. Easy check-in. Responsive host. No hot baths.
Amazing historic home

We're grateful for the chance to stay at Woodside and to explore Marion. Such a treat to stay over at a Frank Lloyd Wright home and read its history and explore the design. Wonderful location and great, easygoing host. Highly recommend!
We had a wonderful stay at Woodside. The spaces are extraordinary and the kitchen is fit for a chef! Thanks for sharing your Usonian treasure with us!

Walk in and see the true hand of the master. One room, thousands of angles, it’s amazing. How many Frank Lloyd Wright houses can you stay in for two days?…a handful and less every year. Don’t wait. Thank you Matthew

Not many opportunities to stay in a Frank Lloyd Wright house and there couldn’t be a better host. Matt was super helpful and check in was flawless. Our group really enjoyed it. We opt for Air BnBs for work trips so we can relax more and this was just the ticket. We will be back next year for the same event.

This is a must stay, especially for architecture fans. Frank Lloyd Wright home from 1955. The design is amazing. Huge ceilings, long hallways with tons of windows allow for a great breeze throughout the home. With 3 fireplaces, this would be great and cozy in the winter.
If you have many friends, definitely a group area, with all private rooms, enough bathrooms to go around, and a well stocked kitchen for any and all cooking needs.
The neighborhood is quiet and peaceful, and at night it's quite easy to see all the stars you don't see in a city.
A large deck and yard provide enough space to hangout with friends without crowding, and have a fire or two on chilly nights.
Everything was clean,tidy, and welcoming for our stay. It was great to see that there were some updates to the home, but most of it is kept original to FLW design.
The host communicated quickly to answer any questions we had, and check-in was easy and painless, letting us get right to enjoying this beautiful home.
Precious experience. You have to stay at this house to fully appreciate it. Matthew was quick to respond to all of our needs. Very gracious host.

It's a legit Frank Lloyd Wright house! It's beautiful and has a lot of history. The outdoor area was great, and the indoor+outdoor sound system was fun.
The accommodations were more rustic than we expected. It felt more like glamping than a luxury home. Only one room had working air conditioning, and the house was generally pretty old. For example, we didn't open some of the doors because of visible bugs and cobwebs on the outside. The furnishing are in need of an update - such as shower fixtures . For the price, we expected better amenities than a motley assortment of old soap bottles on the floor of the shower.
The kitchen was great, and we cooked a lot. We had some issue with plumbing, though, and the fridge has a noisy pump that causes an unpleasant reverberation throughout the kitchen.
The listing said that there was a stationary bike, but it was in a separate building that was locked and inaccessible.

Cannot describe how special this place is! A true gem. The special attention given to light within the home is unreal. How the sunlight hits each room at particular times of the day gives such insight into how thoughtful this piece of architecture truly is. Thank you, Frank Lloyd Wright and thank you, Matthew!

Great spot for architect buffs. There are original blueprints you can look at and a 20 page document written by the original owner about his relationship with FLW and the building process. Very cool spot. An ideal destination in the fall or winter.. we went while there was a heat wave and the AC struggled to work.

The house is amazing and beautiful. It is a historic home and is purposely staged and maintained in a way that is authentic to the times of its design. There are books, photos, and documents about the history and designer which are fascinating. There are some quirks to this home because of its uniqueness, but it did not detract from our stay. It was an amazing place for us!

Matthew was really helpful and communicative. The house itself was simply amazing and it was an opportunity of a lifetime to spend a whole day exploring every part of the house, from original features to later upgrades. Oh, and all the other reviews are right - the kitchen has all you could ever ask for!

Highly recommended for FLW fans. And very grateful that Matthew shares it with everyone. Check-in was simple, communication was excellent, and the house exceeded our expectations. Matthew went above and beyond.
This is a classic Frank Lloyd Wright home, and it should be experienced. Mattew has great communications, and the home was great for the 6 of us to enjoy.

Woodside was such a fantastic place to stay. If you like FLW and have ever wanted to stay in one of his properties, this is a fantastic opportunity to do so. The neighborhood is quiet and serene. The house has a fantastic kitchen and fireplaces to get stuck in and enjoy yourself!
A very unique home in a residential neighborhood with otherwise conventionally designed homes on generous treed lots. Nearby park has very nice public garden with fanciful sculptures and fountains.
One of a kind experience. Great house with lots of privacy when you want it with fantastic shared spaces when everyone is together.
Beautiful home and thoughtful touches to give people an opportunity to enjoy a FLW home.

What can you say about the thrill of staying in a home designed by Frank Lloyd Wright? There was a unique feature around every turn! Matthew’s furnishings compliment the space so well. This is an old home that needs to be treated with respect.

This home was amazing. The spaces are so unique. We wish we got to spend more time in the home as it was a quick in and out trip. But definitely encourage anyone who is a fan of unique stays to book this home!

Great opportunity to stay in a FLW creation. The owner added décor adds to the overall experience. The kitchen has everything needed to prepare a gourmet meal. We wanted for nothing in this gorgeous home. I live close and will definitely rent again, and will suggest it to everyone.
I brought my own plates, pots, bakeware and flatware because I did not know what to expect. There was plenty of the owners items to have left mine at home. There are stemless wineglasses available that pairs well with the huge wine cooler including room for your favorite bottles. Linens and towels are nice quality and plentiful.
The price tag might look high, but the experience was worth every penny. This is not just a place to rest your head; it is a place to enjoy.

What an amazingly unique home! Staying in this original Wright home is something all of us will remember. The available articles and history of the home were great to read and gave a good perspective. There is plenty of space to spread out and/or entertain. The two distinct "wings" make it very accommodating for a multiple family gathering. We'll definitely consider coming back.

Our group of 6 had a great weekend in Marion at the incredible Frank Lloyd Wright home. It was really neat to walk around the house when we first arrived and check out the creative and historical architecture and all of the nooks and crannies built into the place. The kitchen was off the charts and we never wanted for any plate, pot, cup, pan or utensil. The setting is spacious and great for conversation, games, and eating. It will be worth the trip and worth going back.

We brought the whole family out to Katie’s place for my daughter’s IWU graduation. It was a comfortable home base for all the graduation events. It was so nice to relax together in the living room and around the dining table for meals. My senior parents really appreciated the recliners as my mom has back problems. They were a welcome and appreciated surprise. The fenced backyard is large and quiet. We loved watching the squirrels. Plenty of parking space in the wide driveway and the code lock made it easy for the 6 of us to come and go without worrying about sharing a key.
Katie's home was very nice and very well kept. The description was accurate and fit exactly what we needed. Overall a great spot!

My husband and I traveled to IN for a family wedding. The house was cozy, peaceful, and quiet. Close to stores and food as well. The house was clean. My only concerns would be the roof is now black, not blue like the picture(we passed it), and I would have loved if there were some throw blankets and access to a washer/dryer. However, the listing did say there as a laundromat close by but I missed that part. Overall, great stay. Thank you from NC!
Katie was an amazing host. Even became a hero through my stay when I unexpectedly locked myself out. She was attentive and friendly. The house was comfy and warm. Would definitely recommend.
Katie's place was clean, comfortable, and cozy for our stay. It matched the description and had everything we needed.
Katie’s place was so clean, well organized and she was always attentive and helpful! We tried to book it for our next trip and it had already been booked! Highly recommend!

Katie’s place was a beautiful, peaceful place with great decor. it made us feel right at home. Access to restaurants and shopping if that’s what you like to do or sit around fire pit andcrelax.
we had a great time and planning on booking for next year
thank you katie for the wonderful accommodations

My family had a lovely experience with Katie and this air bnb. We had a quiet vacation planned to visit our daughter. The house was sparkling clean, warm, and cozy. We would definitely stay there again!

We rented Katie's place because I wanted a home close to Indiana Wesleyan since we were coming to Marion for the NAIA Outdoor Nationals and we were traveling with a 5 week old baby . It was easy to drive back and forth from campus to this location. The house was clean and the beds were great for sleeping. It was so nice to come back to this space to relax and chill after being at the track and it was really nice for my daughter-in-law and the baby to have this house instead of a hotel room. The kitchen is well stocked. They also have some great games that we played one night. It is also in a good location if you want to go for a walk. As a host, Katie answered all my questions and recommended some great places to eat. It is easy to see why they are a Super Host. This is a great house to stay in if you have a little bit bigger group!
We’ve stayed here a few times & it’s great.

Great location, very central, just off the main drag, and walking distance to Popeye's and Culver's! Katie was very accommodating and helped us resolve some rescheduling issues with the reservation. The place was great for hosting a small gathering with a large dining table and family room. The private backyard is fantastic although the rain kept us from enjoying that.

The place was perfect for our stay.
We have already booked for another visit.

The house was clean with a fantastic open floor plan! Exactly what was promised plus even a little bigger than what we expected. We enjoyed the fire pit in the backyard and our stay overall. Thanks Katie!
The place was very clean and easily accessible. Host answered any questions I had and responded quickly.
Great value & location. Home was very functional with amazing back yard.
Thanks for everything, Katie! We loved it.

Excellent place
Great hospitality!
A++++

This spacious house was the perfect place to call home for a special family event. The kitchen is full of everything you need to cook & store leftovers. Way more spices, pans & utensils, etc than most Airbnbs. I went for walks on the track across the street. AC worked great during a heat wave. We’ll be back!

This home is warm and welcoming. It’s very clean, smells amazing, is spacious and has a large backyard. My favorite spot in the home is the closed in porch.
Katie communicates well and attended to my needs. I was delayed getting inside due to me using an additional keypad near the door which is not the keypad to use for entry. The next day Katie left a note apologizing and a bouquet of flowers to celebrate my upcoming ordination at IWU. That was a sweet gesture.

Katie's house is very clean and well kept. The kitchen was fully stocked. iIt's in a quiet neighborhood. Our family enjoyed the fire ring in the spacious backyard. It was worth every penny. Thanks so much!

This home was a great option for our family to be together our the youngest daughter’s college graduation. Many homey touches throughout made it very comfortable for everyone. Even games and puzzles A/C worked great. Beds were comfortable Kitchen is well-equipped. Location is quiet but not far from restaurants, stores, etc. Katie is a great host. Had a couple questions and she helped us right away. Would definitely recommend for other families staying in the area.
Cozy place to come “home” to at the end of each vacation day. House is well stocked and an very comfortable. Wished it wasn’t so rainy…..the fire pit looked so inviting!
Great place with plenty of space. Well equipped with everything you could need. Close to IWU.
Katie was a excellent host and perfect place
Katie was really good with communication
excellent place, just as described
This house is ready for you to just take your clothes and have a nice quiet time. This was our second stay, but won’t be our last. It is kept clean and well supplied with all of your immediate needs.
We really enjoyed our stay. Very toddler friendly with a booster seat and pack n play available. Plenty of room for our whole family to stay for Thanksgiving. We will be back!
Katie's place was great! It was clean, comfortable, and well-furnished! The yard was amazing! The location was convenient! We had no issues whatsoever! We will definitely stay again!
Katie's place is perfect, just what we needed. Katie is a great host
The house was perfect for our stay. It was very clean, cozy, and spacious. The location is really close to IWU- exactly what we need when we come to Marion. I will definitely book here again.
Nice newly renovated clean house with a large central area for family time. Kitchen well equipped and owner includes many other extras including games and puzzles.

We booked a short stay in Marion and Katie’s place was great! The location was perfect and was a short drive to various restaurants. And, the location was very safe being so close to the high school. We will stay there again!
Great space and perfect location for our visit.
cozy Little house in the heart of town
awesome house! we really enjoyed our stay. the kitchen and backyard were great to have. plenty of beds for everyone too!
The house was nice and spacious. Everything was clean and we had everything we needed. The location greatclose to restaurants, shopping, etc. Communication was great!

What a wonderful stay! The home was clean, friendly, comfortable and easy to find in town. Katie was very responsive to any issue we had, and we would definitely stay at any of her homes (if she had more) in the future. Thank you, thank you!
Nice house, everything was clean and functional. Quiet neighborhood.

There is a nice large yard which would have been great if the weather was a bit cooler. The central air was a definite plus. We also liked the keyless entry since we had a couple of family members coming and going.

Loved the house and we will definitely stay again. We had 7 people in our group and everyone enjoyed the house and the location. It’s close to or with-in minutes of everything. The house made our visit to Indiana a pleasant one. Thank you Katie!

This was perfect for what we needed! We were all able to stay in one house and spend time together, rather than staying in separate rooms in a hotel. Katie had everything we could need and was very responsive and kind. Thanks again Katie!
Ample space both inside and out. You'll enjoy the games, books, and opportunities to kick back and relax. Great space for a family reunion with a large table and a HUGE backyard!

This place was clean and was perfect for our family as we celebrated our son’s graduation from IWU! Katie / The hosts were extremely responsive and the house was perfect for entertaining! It even had some fresh eggs for us! We’d highly recommend this wonderful / comfortable home!
Nice neighborhood very clean house and close to any restaurant’s and stores.
Very nice house and glad I booked!
Good location, especially for IWU. Very comfortable with everything you could need for a family.
I seem to always hit the Air BnB jackpot. I did once again with Katie's place in Marion, IN! Clean, comfy, great location. Katie is a wonderful host and offers a wonderful place.
A gracious host, great accommodations. Highly recommended.
You won't regret it. Fully stocked kitchen, plenty of towels and toiletries. Everything you need to be comfortable is there for you. Quiet street close to many restaurants and shops.
Nice place to stay. Very clean and quite

Quite neighborhood. So much better than staying in a hotel, wondering about noises in the rooms next to you or above you. Katie has the home so well decorated supplied that you feel right at home. Even the 2 teenagers we had with us loved it!!
We have stayed he multiple times over the past months. This should speak for itself being we keep coming back to stay here. Super host and always a great place to stay.
Great place to stay! Very clean and comfortable!
We always enjoy staying here while working at the VA Medical center. Katie is the best host.

Unfortunately we were not able to make the trip and stay in the home due to unexpected situations. Katie was very understanding and flexible. She responded promptly. Looking forward to being able to stay in the future.

Beautiful, comfortable home! All seems brand new. Extremely clean!!! Open floor plan is wonderful. Backyard and screened in back porch are great for relaxing. Warm and sweet personal touches throughout the home. Thank you for a great stay.
Great space in a central location.
Great place. We have stayed there times and i would recommend it to anyone else.
Everything was great! Loved the look of the house and there were plenty of extra amenities.
This is a great house and a great location. Very convenient to everything but seemed very private. Very clean. And had a great backyard! We would love to come back
We enjoyed staying here while we were working in town. We would highly recommend this home to anyone who is in the area and we would stay again. Katie was very responsive and great to work with.
Great place to stay
Katie is very pleasant and handled issues quickly. The house is convenient to shopping and dining.
Spotless, quiet, beautiful bathroom! Close to the college campus. Will definitely visit again!

We had a great weekend celebrating a niece’s graduation at Taylor University. The location was perfect for us. Loved the quiet and peaceful surroundings and the apartment was nice and clean. We’d definitely come back if we were in the area!
Great stay

Venecia was very welcoming, offered help in anything we needed! Very attentive to our needs! Excellent parking location. Venecia went above and beyond when there was something that we needed! Very much worth it! Would love to visit again!

The farmhouse was just what we were looking for! Everything matched the description provided by the host. It's off the beaten path, yet stores can easily be found nearby. We loved the proximity to Indiana Wesleyan University. If we find ourselves back in Marion, we hope to return.

We enjoyed our stay at Venecia's place! Beautiful, peaceful setting! The apartment was nicely decorated and spotlessly clean! Venecia responded promptly to any messages we sent her. We would definitely stay here again if we are in the area and would recommend it to our friends! Thanks again for the lovely place to stay!
The farm house apartment is beautiful, very clean and the location is great. Venecia and Dan are responsive and great to work with. Fishing in the pond was fun!!!
Return customer. Love to stay here! Always impeccably clean. Hosts are responsive and easy to work with!

This was a wonderful place for me and my Husband come and have a getaway from our Busy life. It was like home away from home with out the busyness.everything you need from cooking ,Laundry, watching a movie on the couch to an Amazing shower which was my favorite. Nice size bedroom with a comfortable Bed. Then let’s top it off with the Amazing hospitality we received! We were surprised with a beautiful fruit and muffin basket welcoming us to there Home. We are excited to come back again. I hope we met your expectations as guest. Thank you for having us 🥰🙏🏽
great place.
Wi-Fi internet did not work needs to be fixed and upgraded in the near future. Everything else was good.

This Airbnb was perfect for our trip! added plus it snowed and we were able to experience snow for the first time in a beautiful place! It was super clean and provided everything we could need. Would 10/10 recommend!
Always love this relaxing getaway!
Absolutely pleasant stay! Felt like a brand new place, beautifully furnished, in a picturesque setting.
Great little place on the outskirts of town but still close to Marion and Gas City. New and well equipped, I would stay here again!
Beautiful condo set in the country. You do need to climb a flight of stairs to enter but the large shower with a rainfall shower head was wonderful. Great decor!

Such a lovely location! Everything was great in this place. It was clean, warm and had every amenity you can think of. The host were amazing. Thanks for the fruit basket and the muffins were so delicious.

The apartment is very pretty, comfortable, and new. It was super clean and had everything one might need. Fully stocked big bathroom with plenty of hot water, sizable furnished kitchen with coffee pods, washer and dryer with detergent provided, and king size bed. The bed was a little hard for us, but may be perfect for others. We did not find the common work area that was noted to be shared by the apartments, but there is a little table and chair in the apt to work on. The host was gracious in turning up the temp as it was a little chilly the first evening.
There are 2 signs that say “bed and breakfast” at the entrance. Each morning we smelled some fantastic breakfast food being cooked somewhere, but if you want some food to go with the smells, you will need to bring your own food and cook it in the nice kitchen. We did ask the host if breakfast was included, but we did not get a response.
The place is a little hard to find, as the GPS takes you to the wrong area to access the drive. I had looked at the satellite overview before we left and noticed this, so we made it fine. Due to some internet issues at the facility for the hosts, we were a little late getting the code to get in. Host was helpful in getting us the code in a reasonable timeframe after we arrived.
The entrance to the apartments (there are 2) is a shared entrance, and the door to use is marked FARMHOUSE, but no instructions were provided as to using that door to access the apartments that are upstairs on a landing. Once we figured that out, we were good. The host did respond to messages, and we eventually got the info.
As for internet, their Wi-Fi internet access is through LTE, and really doesn’t support the workspace they promoted. It didn’t work but for a few hours while we were here at the apt. The host did try to fix it but didn’t get it solidified.
This was a cozy stay & perfect for my recent work trip. It had a well stocked kitchen & the hosts are very responsive. Would book again!
Beautiful place, everything was new and clean and an awesome location off the beaten path
A beautiful and relaxing location! I would love to stay there again!
Beautiful property and accommodation, couldn't ask for better.

A little difficulty finding the place, but from there, may be the best place I’ve stayed. Everything well thought out. Very comfortable and everything you would end for a short or long stay. Greeted with the bast Banana Muffins I’ve ever tasted!

This place was immaculate! Beautifully designed, with thoughtful touches (including a basket with homemade muffins and fresh fruits/veggies. Comfortable bed and our 15 year-old said the sleeper sofa was very comfortable. Easy check in, and good communication from the hosts. Enjoyed our stay.
We loved it here! Our stay was FANTASTIC!
I enjoyed the time my family stayed here. Was clean and had everything the listing stated.
Very beautiful & clean!! We enjoyed our stay and would highly recommend this place to others.

Great place to stay close to IWU and Wesley Seminary! Everything mentioned in the description matched with excellence! Clean, equipped, and private, yet close enough to town. You will not be disappointed!
This is a hidden country gem! Pond for fishing, a little beach, and everything you need, including a lovely welcome basket. Check it out! We’ll definitely be back :). Also, shower was just divine.
Gorgeous place. Very quiet and peaceful. Helpful hosts that answered my newbie questions with ease.
Stayed here while visiting family. It was very comfortable. There was a breakfast basket provided which was a nice touch. It is in a nice quiet neighborhood. We would look at staying here again!!
Always a great stay!
A great little getaway! Very quiet and cute. The Wi-Fi is not very reliable if you need to get work done.
Very comfortable and clean place. Out in the country so it’s quiet and peaceful.
This is such a nice, quiet area! Very clean and everything you need is right there!
This place was great! Awesome location, 10 minutes from great spots to get dinner. Very clean and everything we could possibly need was provided.
Great spot for anyone visiting students at IWU or Taylor U.

The unit is beautiful BUT you do have to climb around 17 steps to get up to the unit which is located over their 3 car garage. I don’t believe it was listed under the description when I chose the unit. It was challenging for my sister to get her luggage up. We had late nights with family and planned to sleep in, with headboard of the bed being over the garage door (opening several times) it was not happening unfortunately. I did miss it was controlled temp which would have been okay had a fan been provided. Two middle age women with hot flashes so had to open the window in the bedroom. We were in unit 1 however I do think unit 2 may have been quieter (because of the garage doors opening). All in all it’s a nice place in a secluded located but definitely could not stay again.
One of the best airbnbs I’ve ever stayed in! Accurate to pictures!
Lovely place! Highly recommend

The place looks really nice. There is a complimentary fruits and snacks provided which is a sweet touch. Communication with the owner is good as well. We encountered internet problem that is the only downfall, my boyfriend wasn’t able to connect for work and on our last day of stay he has to go to Starbucks but other than that it was a good stay it is quiet too. They did some remedy to help with the internet which is nice but it just didn’t work well at some point.

The host have thought of everything to make a stay comfortable. The location is convenient to town yet
very peaceful. The well stock kitchen allowed us to cook meals and save money. The host were very friendly, helpful and attentive.

Traveling with an infant can be hard. Daniel and Vanecia’s place made our visit peaceful and enjoyable. So many neat touches to the Airbnb, you can truly tell they take pride in their work. Communication, cleanliness, and customer service were great. We hope to be back soon.
Comfortable, clean, and quiet! Would gladly stay here when we're in the area again. Bed is very comfortable, and the shower is great!

My husband and I enjoyed staying here for a night while we were in town for an event. It was peaceful, quiet, and very comfortable. We enjoyed everything about our stay. We would definitely come back. We especially enjoyed the large kitchen, even though we didn’t use it while we were there. It’s a nice touch for those staying longer than a night or two.

Great and beautiful space!!! We loved our stay. The rain shower head was awesome, and the welcome basket was a kind touch. The kitchen was well stocked with supplies too. Only note - the apartment unit is over the garage, so you will hear the door opening and closing when the owners come and go. Not an issue at all, but just something to be aware of!
Great place to stay! Very clean, comfortable, modern farmhouse style and new. Smooth and prompt communication for reservation.

Very enjoyable stay, excellent communication and lovely place! Location is convenient, but in a serene setting. Fresh bakery & fruit added the extra touch! Would definitely stay again when in the area.

Beautiful apartment just as described! Clean, and everything was brand new and looked amazing, especially the rain shower. They even provided complimentary basket with snacks and coffee. Would definitely come back to stay again!

We stayed here for our anniversary. The place is very clean and very nice. Was a little hard to find, especially in the dark, but we figured it out. Parking was more than adequate and it is a nice property away from town. The bed was comfortable, which is coming from someone who has a hard time sleeping well on anything but my own bed. For breakfast they had a basket with muffins, nuts, fruit and caramels, all of which was great.
Quiet area, well maintained! Good communication from hosts. Going back this weekend.
Great touches, thoughtful set up - exactly as described. More nights here for me ahead!
We loved our stay. It was quiet, clean, and exactly what was described! Will definitely come back again.
beyond amazing. they are so very kind and considerate. the place is gorgeous in an amazing setting. will be looking forward to staying again
Great place in the countryside, just a few minutes from Marion. The kitchen is great, nice bathroom. We will be back again.
This was our second visit to this lovely, peaceful property. We will be regulars.
A great place to stay - super clean & well appointed! Responsive & thoughtful hosts!
Very pretty space. Modern, plenty of extras. Would recommend
Convenient to Marion and easy to reach. Very comfortable and check in was easy.
Great AirBnb rental. We enjoyed having a cookout with family using the provided grill and guest patio. Will definitely rent this place again.
Quiet spot with easy access to both TU and IWU, as well as groceries and restaurants. Clean, modern farmhouse apartment.
Great, comfy place to stay! Fully equipped to meet your every need!
Great stay, well appointed space that is exceptionally clean. Basket with fruit and muffins was a really nice gesture as well. We will be back if we’re in the area again!

This is one beautiful place! If you have a reason to be in the Marion area Daniel’s apartments are a great place to stay. The space is luxurious and the fixtures and finishes are farm fresh and fancy. It’s off the beaten path but minutes from anything you could need. There’s some noise during the day and evening since the apartment is above the garage but nothing excessive and exactly what I would expect in any apartment building. It’s quite spacious and loaded with extra touches. One of the cleanest spaces we’ve stayed in as well. Great space!
Lovely room! Beautiful, quiet, well stocked room. We would gladly recommend this room to other.
Great stay, clean & comfortable with plenty of room!

Pros:
We had zero issues finding the spot with the detailed directions they provided.
Keyless locks made lockouts impossible. Very convenient.
Cleanliness was up to par with every review you'll read. Nearly spotless.
Cons:
Communication, kind of lacking. I asked maybe 2 questions during our stay and it took quite some time to get responses back. There are clearly 2 rooms they rent out, but I believe we were the only ones there at the time.
Internet. At .26mbps ( yeah, I've got the screen shot to prove it ) you'll be pressed to load simple websites. That is, if you're able to even stay connected to the router at all. If you need to get any work done over WiFi, you won't be doing it here. The solution to the latter? Unplug the router for 10 minutes and plug it back in. Did it help? No. Use your cell service and move on.
Food Basket. Yeah they went above and beyond with the basket of treats, but when you have to deal with fruit flies is it a bonus or an annoyance? If you enjoy looking at wilted cherries and swatting at pesky insects, you'll enjoy the basket.
Noise. No pets allowed to stay here except the dogs that are right underneath you barking through the night. Nothing like waking up at 1AM and not being able to fall back asleep from the constant back and forth. They claimed to have sound monitors for their self-imposed quiet hours. Too bad their dogs are subjected to the same respectful rules.
The weeks prior to our stay I was excited. We left thouroughly unimpressed. But I suppose this is better than the crime ridden city just 5 miles from here (Marion, if you care to look it up). I'm sure your stay here would be better than ours and I hope the best for anyone booking a stay here

We had a wonderful stay, everything was very clean as well as very professional. All amenities were great, and on the second morning we received a muffin and fruit basket which was wonderful! The condo had everything we needed and much better than any hotel we’ve been to. I would completely recommend this place to anyone thinking of staying here!

Traveling for work, stayed here to escape the monotonous hotel life and it was great! It was super clean, quiet, and the shower was super fancy! Bed was comfortable, washer and dryer in unit for use was helpful. Hosts were very accommodating as my stay was last minute and they were so kind, allowing me late check-out since I work night shift and I needed sleep before leaving. The 1st night they left me a cute basket with some baked good treats and fresh fruit which was unexpected, such a nice touch. Hope to stay again :)
It's a nice place, out in the country and quiet.

What a great space! It’s a little difficult to find as we got there later at night, but they sent us a link to get there safely. It’s a beautiful place inside, and it’s very peaceful. The bed was super comfortable, and the bathroom and kitchen were both beautiful and functional. Very stylish and cozy! They left muffins, nuts and fresh fruit, as well as coffee, tea and hot chocolate Keurig pods. The hosts are very friendly and helpful, and went out of their way to answer questions about the space and the area. If we’re in the area again, we would definitely stay there. :)
A lovely place - great amenities, new, spotless. Very attentive hosts!

If you’re visiting Grant County it’s the perfect central location. Everything seemed brand new and meticulously clean. It’s very unique because muffins and fruit are provided. Not to mention sugar and cream for your coffee etc. I often travel and have to stop at the store after arrival when I find the necessities aren’t there. This place had everything you need. It’s also gorgeous and well thought out and designed. I’m already in the process of rebooking.

This apartment was super clean—it almost felt like we were the first guests to ever stay there. And the bed was very comfortable. I wish we’d had time to sleep in! Finding the place was challenging, even though we had detailed directions. I wouldn’t hesitate to book it again!
Clean and spacious
Always a nice quiet place to stay. The snack basket is always a nice touch.

Great location for parents on a visit to Taylor University
Very nice, new, and clean
Nice place to stay, out in the country. Very clean and well kept.
Beautiful, clean, and comfortable.
Super comfy and has everything you could possibly need. Super clean and put together. 10/10 would recommend and go again.
Once again, a very enjoyable, comfortable stay.
Wonderful place to stay! It was very clean, Morten but country which made the place So cozy! The breakfast basket was also amazing! Thank you!
Cute space—thoughtfully designed and a perfect place to rest and relax for the night.
The condo was beautifully decorated and had everything that we needed. The hosts were very quick to respond and we had a lovely stay.
This is a very beautiful and homey place to stay. Everything was spotlessly clean and the hosts were very hospitable. Did not disappoint!
Everything was sparkling clean, modern and new. The location was great for us, close by to Indiana Wesleyan. The muffins and fruit were delicious.
Beautiful space. Very thoughtful design. Comfortable bed. We enjoyed our stay.

Beautiful place to get away from the city. We planned to go to Salamonie Lake and wanted someplace to stay for a long weekend trip. We really enjoyed the quiet area. We’re so glad we chose to stay here. Very clean and the hosts were responsive to our questions. Lovely & cozy space to relax. We’ll definitely be coming back!

The space was impeccably clean. Bed and linens were super cozy. Loved the cabin feel paired with grey decor and modern fixtures. Fully equipped kitchen with new appliances. Great washer and dryer in closet inside unit. Bathroom sink was a little bit high which would be hard for children to reach. Enjoyed the beautiful view of a quiet neighborhood. There was just one time we heard a dog bark loudly. Otherwise a perfectly peaceful evening!
Great place to stay!
Super clean, modern space. Very comfortable. Would highly recommend!

Overall, the stay was wonderful! The room was exceptionally clean and updated, with everything you could need they provided. You felt safe with quality lock systems and privacy was no issue. Would definitely recommend to anyone visiting the area.
Great place. Beautiful, secluded, and cozy!
Wonderful communication. Wonderful place to stay and the apartment was very clean and welcoming. Would definitely stay here again.

Modern Farmhouse Airbnb is exactly as it is described! It is beautifully decorated and the added amenities such as the Keurig with Kcups, sugar & brown sugar, bottles of water, and the goodie basket show how much the hosts care about their home and guests. The amazing setting outside is so spectacular and great for the soul.
The king-size bed is oh so comfortable and the rainfall shower is exactly what is needed after a long day.
We will definitely be back as nothing in Marion compares!!!
They were great to work with and provided outstanding hospitality!

This apartment is beautiful. The pictures do not do it justice.
The hosts were welcoming, kind, very responsive, and thoughtful.
It was extremely clean, tidy, and well prepared and stocked for guests. And, it is extremely close to town, but has the benefits of a quiet seven acres.
The beds were very comfortable, especially the queen couch bed. There were plenty of linens, pillows, and blankets.
The shower was amazing with great pressure. However, for this that like to take baths, it is a shower-only unit.
There were only a few things that I wished I would have paid attention to in the description or would have known.
This is an above the garage apartment complex, housing two units. You will be responsible for packing you things up a flight of stairs (15 stairs, if you would like details).
There is not a dishwasher or a full-pot coffee maker—only a one-cup maker. Both, not deal breakers, but other travelers should be prepared. We simply ran to Walmart and purchased a $10 coffee pot that worked well for our weekend.
Honestly, the only downfall was the sulfur smell of the water. It wasn’t overwhelming, but lingered in the apartment after washing dishes or taking a shower. However, I wouldn’t let that stop you from renting this place.
You will love this cozy and modern apartment.
Beautiful, clean and enjoyed the private entrance. Daniel and Valencia were pleasant host, looking to book again when I come home again!
such a wonderful place to stay. quiet country setting with BEAUTIFUL living space. hosts are accommodating and kind. looking forward to staying again.
Very clean, well appointed, and hosts were very responsive awesome stay.

Lovely space! You can’t ask more from an Airbnb. You can tell the space is brand new and it was thoughtfully built. Just 2 notes: there was a bright exterior light on all night right outside the bedroom. The curtains blocked the light but it still filtered into the room above the curtain rod—this is just in apt 1. Also the water has a bad smell to it, which probably can’t be helped. These are not reasons to not book this place though, it was great!
Such a beautiful place and a perfect little getaway!!

From the Keurig to the hairdryer no detail is unnoticed in this cozy space. This was the PERFECT place for an extended stay. Daniel and his wife were so kind and accommodating. Cannot recommend their place enough. A truly wonderful experience.

We stayed at Daniel's Place to get away for a relaxing trip. His place was absolutely spotless and has a fully functioning kitchen along with a Keurig and complimentary K-cups! They filled the place with sweet touches like home baked banana muffins and tips on good restaurants in the area. When we arrived we were having trouble getting the wifi to work, which was a big deal for us as we needed it to get some work done. Daniel saved the day and bought and additional router just to ensure we could get the connection we needed! He was very quick to respond to all of our questions/concerns. I would definitely recommend staying in this place and would do so again!

Very clean. As described. Road a little busy but quieted down after dark. 1.5 blocks off the main road with easy access to all the restaurants etc. Sleeper sofas worked well for extra beds. Plenty of on street parking right in front of the house.
It is a beautiful home with great amenities! It was very clean and even came with a washer and dryer for clothes! Thank you Doug for a wonderful stay!
Great little house close to IWU.
This is the second time my parents and I have stayed here. First time was for my junior recital and this time was for my graduation. Both stays were fantastic and everything is how we remembered.
House was clean and great for a short stay!
Perfect location for my conference at Indiana Wesleyan University.

I never stayed at an AirBnB before, as I typically stick with hotels for the convenience. But after staying here, I think I'd prefer it over a hotel! I had complete privacy for me and my partner to stay in. No loud guests in other rooms to worry about. The place was clean and smelled nice. We had a full kitchen to enjoy use and could even do our laundry as needed without having to share with other guests. The location was perfect as it was close to everything I needed to go to. The heating worked great, as it was fairly cold the weekend of my visit. The bathroom had a nice deep tub. The bonus of a security system and lock made me feel nice and safe. And the price was cheaper than most of the local hotels and was 100× cleaner and nicer than the more affordable rooms I could have rented. Next time I come to Marion, I would definitely rent this exact house again if it's available when I come into town.

You guys! Our immediately family (now all grown adults) left our spouses at home and used this house to celebrate the baby brother’s masters graduation. We were close to the university (IWU), close to the Meijer and MAY I RECOMMEND- close to OBI’s BBQ downtown!!!! We all slept comfortably, table was great for late night cards and bagels with coffee each morning. We knew there was one bathroom- so we navigated that with 6 adults… ABSOLUTELY worth it for this price and this friendly of a hands-off host.
Very nice

This is our second stay at Doug and Sarah’s place. It is warm and cozy. They are both very responsive and pay close attention to detail. We asked to check in early and they accommodated our requests. Anytime we are in Marion we plan to stay here! Awesome place and hosts.
It was as it was described. Close parking.
We enjoyed our stay and appreciated that everything was clean and tidy.
It was true to the photos, amenities, the fine details, quiet and very cozy. We would stay there again. In fact one of our family members booked this home in a couple of months.

The area was a little noisy with neighbors and police at the neighbors’ (next door) less than 30 min after we got there. Inside the house was great with new nice furnishings, clean home and wonderful sheets. The only issue was the musty smell and towels/washcloths smelling like pet urine. They were clean but once they have that smell, you can’t get it out and they need replaced. Other than that, inside the house was great! We loved the big TV, comfy bed and stocked kitchen. My granddaughter loved the filtered water in the kitchen. We had no more issues with police noises after that initial incident. Overall, it’s a great deal for the money. We appreciate how clean the place was.
Great location
House was very clean,

Doug was lovely to book with!! He moved check-in and out around for me based on my needs. I was attending a friend’s wedding and he adjusted accordingly, and responded very fast. Loved the smart TV, coffee pods and creamer included, Tide pods too! Very roomy and large. Porch was very peaceful as well. Thank you Doug, so much!
This place is not bad, but it wasn't for me. For the most part, it meets all a person's needs.
We have stayed at Doug's place (Room4more@1204) multiple times. It is perfect for our needs and always very enjoyable. I would highly recommend it.

Doug's place is awesome. It is extremely spacious and comfortable and is exactly as described. The kitchen had everything we needed to cook full on meals every night. The only challenge was that only one of the four burners on the stove worked, but we managed to work around that.
The street was quiet, with lots of street parking available. We would definitely stay here again.
Very clean place. Would stay again.
A comfortable place and a place of all the services
We had a wonderful stay. The home was nice and clean. Check in was simple. I would definitely stay here again.

This is our 2nd stay here while attending our grandson’s Allstar Baseball Tournament in Sweetser. Perfect location, just 5 minutes from the ball park. The house has all that you need and is nicely decorated. No complaints for “Room 4 More!”

I have rented this place before, due to you get the whole house rather than a rm, this place is in a great location with the conveniences of close shopping. Has an issue with the air conditioner, i called, and he had it fixed, up and running within a couple hrs. I will rent this from him again and encourage others to do the same.
Great spot, very close to restaurants and grocery stores. Enjoyed our stay to visit family in the area.
Tasteful, comfortable, and clean! Close to the university & plenty of restaurants around! Doug was a great host!

overall the stay was amazing. the house was clean and comfortable, the neighborhood was quiet and in a great location the only comments I have is I would have liked to have been able to check in earlier, it would be nice if the listing included what type of coffee maker was present, (Keurig or drip) so that we know what kind of coffee to bring with us, and if it were me, I would have talked about the parking in the back option as part of the arrival instructions. otherwise, this was definitely I. my top 2 of positive Air B&B stays.
the place was exactly what we were looking for and was perfect. it was clean, spacious and perfectly priced. loved staying there
Great place!
Great stay! Very clean, cute, and had everything we needed!

The house had an updated Grandma’s house vibe and the lilac bushes in full bloom topped it off! We enjoyed our stay! Everything we needed was available to us at the house with special eclectic touches that made us smile!

Great place two cars couldn't park in the back because of broken glass from maybe a mirror in the back alley. I've nearly been hit twice as well as Kyle crossing the street. Nothing wrong with actual house though great house. Loved it and beautiful.
Place was exactly as described and just like the pictures. No issues at all. House was warm and cozy, bed was comfortable, and place was very clean. Would stay here again. Thanks
Great host!!!!

Doug’s place was so great!
Comfortable and had everything thing we needed and more! It was so clean and stocked with extra towels and bedding!
Even though it was winter the porch was so nice to have!
We look forward to booking again and definitely recommend it!
My husband and I really enjoyed our stay at Doug’s place. Everything was clean and how we were expecting it to be! We would definitely stay there again!

This house was close enough to IWU to visit but far enough away to get away from campus. We were pleasantly surprised with the electric fireplace. We also loved the complementary Netflix and Amazon video on the TV.

The house is older but modernized with electronic locks, a smart thermostat, large tv, new carpeting and furniture. The bed was wonderful and the space was clean. The decor gave the house a pleasant personality.

Doug’s house is excellent and I would recommend it to anyone looking for a place near IWU. His house made for a great stay on a weekend away. Everything was well cared for and exceptionally clean. They provided everything needed for a comfortable stay. We will stay again soon!

This place was perfect for our trip! I was there solo for a few days before a couple
Friends joined for the weekend. It was clean, quiet, and easy to access. Couldn’t recommend enough!

Great little house that was perfect for our needs. We weren't there much during the day, but it was a great space to come back to in the evenings to relax and get some sleep. The main bed was very comfortable and we were also pleasantly surprised by how comfortable the pull out sofas were. We enjoyed our stay and would recommend this location to others looking for a nice, clean house to stay at.
House was clean and cozy. Enjoyed our weekend
We have stayed here 3 times now and everytime we love it. Great host, great space, and well worth your money! This has become our new stay anytime coming to the area.

Very clean and well appointed. Not terribly close to IWU, but near the other hotels in the area. A little steep for game day weekend, but overall a very enjoyable stay. It was very close to the entrance to the bike path, which was great.
Great place to stay! Clean and comfortable!
A great house and location. Will stay again.
Very enjoyable home. Pictures and information are accurate. Doug and Sarah were very responsive and answered our questions timely. We will book again.
Doug was super quick in communicating back when I had questions. The inside of the house was exceptionally clean, and was in a quite neighborhood! Would absolutely recommend, and would stay again!
Having to get to the only bathroom through the 2nd bedroom was a little inconvenient especially for 3 guys over 60. Otherwise everything was as advertised.

I had a peaceful stay at Doug and Sarah’s home. It was clean, open airy, well decorated, and thoughtful. I loved the record player(my daughter bought me the same one). The indoor porch was perfect for when my family came
to visit. Marion was beautiful this weekend too! Thank you, Lucinda
Everything was perfect, very clean, good communication and flexible owner!

Doug’s place was very nice, well appointed and conveniently located. My business partner and I stayed here the bed was great the couch bed was pretty standard so not great. Wouldn’t suggest sleeping on that if you are my size or bigger 6’0” 220lb. Definitely will return if it’s just me.
Good value and clean. We stayed for a softball tournament and it was a bit out of the way for that but all the essentials that you need are there.
This place was super cozy. The screened in porch was a great place to relax and watch the sun go down.

Just perfect!! Room4More is all that it says it is and more!! Such a comfortable space; no complaints at all!! Spacious, clean, very comfortable bed, kitchen has all that you need and great laundry facility!! We were looking for a place close to Sweetser for a baseball tournament and this is just 5-10 minutes from the ball diamonds! I’d you’re looking for a great place to stay in Marion, THIS IS IT!! Thank you, Doug!!
2nd time staying at Doug's place and would highly recommend!!

Hosts are quick responders! Doug helped us get back in, once we had locked ours out… the place was cute and roomy! Several fun and thoughtful touches around the rooms. Great location and nice neighborhood! Would definitely stay here again!
The home was very cozy and the host was super friendly!
Great place, very clean and the hosts are quick to respond, helpful and very polite!!!

Nice house, clean, looks exactly like the pictures. Just what we needed for our mini family vacation! I never needed to contact the host, check in was super easy with the security app and the info folder in the house answered any other questions I had.

This was a very pleasing house, the neighborhood seemed very nice and safe. The parking was on the street, although an option was given to park in the back, I never parked back there.
The door lock was a little tricky but it worked out very well. I do recommend this house as it is very clean and the bed is comfortable. The porch on front is a nice touch with the small-ish picnic table for relaxing and enjoying a cool evening.
However, the only drawbacks of the house were the second bedroom and the bathroom. The second bedroom had a pull-out couch for your bed. Not what I was expecting. Not only this but you've got to go through the second bedroom to get to the one and only bathroom.
So, if you've got another guest with you on your stay, then you must go through their bedroom to use the restroom. Awkward, if they are already in bed at the time!
The second issue is the bathroom. Whereas everything was really nice and clean, highly commend Doug and his wife on cleaning, the issue was with the commode! The commode must have been a kindergarten or elementary school commode.There is no way that a grown man, (6'1", 265 lbs,) can sit on the seat then do (to put it politely), #1 & #2, without shifting forward or backwards for clearance. Seriously, it was small!
Other than these two issues, I do recommend this house as a one bedroom house. Doug was easy to contact, so over all I would have given him a 5 star except for the two issues.
Clean, comfortable, and welcoming. Easy check in and out. Parking is available in the back.
The house is very clean and easy to get too. Doug is easy to get a hold off of you need him.
Darling place. Clean and inviting!

this I can't say enough about in writing, the people that own it are amazing and sweet and super helpful and respond so fast, the home is adorable and I love the fenced in yard with a little one as well , and being able to do laundry being located so close to everything we needed I will absolutely stay here again when I come back perfect little cute very homey cozy feeling house. I miss it already and Ijust got home last night
This is a very nice house on a quiet street in the center of Marion. It has everything you need including lots of plugs for charging devices. Parking is available in back.

Lovely home and perfect for our needs. The location was convenient to shopping and Indiana Wesleyan University where we were attending our son's graduation. The house is exactly as described and immaculately cleaned and maintained. The bed was comfortable and the linens were of excellent quality. Plenty of room to spread out and the 3 season porch was so cute too. we highly recommend!
The place is nice and check in is smooth. It’s my second time with them :)
awesome location- always such a clean place
Quiet, good location, and very cute! Everything we needed. Would stay again!
Clean and nice place. Close to coffee shop and the hospital. Neighborhood looks safe. Host responds fast.
